radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar subsegmental atelectasis noted; liver, pancreas, spleen, and adrenal glands normal; caliceal distortion and cortical scarring bilaterally; no focal renal lesions or hydronephrosis; diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon; appendix top-normal in size measuring up to 9 mm with mild mucosal hyperemia and mild associated fat stranding; prostate enlarged; mild atherosclerotic disease noted; no evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The appendix had measured 6 mm on remote prior exam.
